alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Calhoun; Lexington; Richland; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:53PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, Lexington, north central Aiken, east central Saluda and northwestern Richland Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 353 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Batesburg-Leesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Batesburg-Leesville, St. Andrews, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, Oak Grove, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Harbison State Forest, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market, Columbia Metro Airport, Pelion, Gilbert, and Summit. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 2. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 35 and 66. Interstate 26 between mile markers 102 and 123. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
